name: 018 Fl_wer BARS
description:
" I think we can think we really can do anything with anything. Look a these bars for example : I'm just creating colored bars pushing my buttons with my fingers right ? And then I just wrap the image to have a feel of a flower. THEN I name it Flower. 

Reaally, I got faith I think. Flipping my saddest moment into the greatest memories, seeing the true power of the thing we name life."

"This is the last one coming from my project VRAI FAUX EP / 1 - LE TRICOT (project never ever released) 
[15-18] of my series AotR are from it."

----
Contact me if you collect it, I can give you a 2000*2000 low compressed H264 version of it + the hidden poem associated with this visual.
----
